property.name: Description
property.value: Test the function Cdd_UtcTime_Init, clear the UTC time data

property.name: Test_Step_0
property.value: Clear the UTC time data when hard reset occured

property.name: Test_Step_1
property.value: UTC struct is valid => nothing to expect

property.name: Description
property.value: Test the function Cdd_UtcTime_SyncWithRtc

property.name: Description
property.value: Test the function Cdd_UtcTime_GetUtcTime

property.name: Description
property.value: Test the function Cdd_UtcTime_GetRtcCounter

property.name: Description
property.value: Test the function Cdd_UtcTime_ReceiveData

property.name: Description
property.value: Empty function

property.name: Description
property.value: Test the function Cdd_UtcTime_SetUtcTime

property.name: Description
property.value: Test that the Cdd_UtcTime_gmtime64 correctly convert the UTC time in milliseconds to year-month-day-hour-minute-second

property.name: Description
property.value: Test that the Cdd_UtcTime_gmtime64 correctly convert the UTC time for the cornercase midnight 1970

property.name: Description
property.value: Test that the Cdd_UtcTime_gmtime64 correctly convert the UTC time for a leap year

property.name: Description
property.value: Test that the Cdd_UtcTime_gmtime64 correctly convert the UTC time for the start of a leap year

property.name: Description
property.value: Test that the Cdd_UtcTime_gmtime64 correctly convert the UTC time for the end of a leap year

property.name: Description
property.value: Test that the Cdd_UtcTime_gmtime64 correctly convert the UTC time at 29th February in a leap year

property.name: Description
property.value: Test that the Cdd_UtcTime_gmtime64 correctly convert the UTC time for the first day of the year

property.name: Description
property.value: Test that the Cdd_UtcTime_gmtime64 correctly convert the UTC time for the last day of the year

property.name: Description
property.value: Test that the Cdd_UtcTime_gmtime64 correctly handle UTC time after 2038: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Year_2038_problem

property.name: Description
property.value: Test that the Cdd_UtcTime_gmtime64 correctly convert the UTC time for a leap year that can be divided by 100

property.name: Description
property.value: Test that the Cdd_UtcTime_gmtime64 correctly convert the UTC time for a leap year that can be divided by 400
